alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 5:53PM AKST until February 24 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Areas of light freezing rain and snow will continue into this evening. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Ice accumulation of less than one tenth of an inch are expected. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 AM Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of freezing rain will end this evening. Snow, blowing snow, and freezing rain will redevelop during the day Wednesday and continue through Wednesday night. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
